title: Peter
body:
Ah, glad to see you have made it this far.
Lucky you, I guess.
<<if !hasUpgrade(2)>>
    You still know I sell upgrades for the soul of the innocent, right?
    Hah, just kidding.
    It's just peoples trust in you that I use up.
    This time I can offer you a splendid blocking ability.
    Just be invulnerable while dashing around.
    Sounds good? I thought so!
    Only 6 tokens. You know the deal.
    -> I'd like to buy the shield.
        [[Peter.BuyShield]]
<<endif>>
-> Anything you can tell me about this timeline?
    Hm, it appears that Famine holds it's reign here.
    You will see a lot of precious metals.
    If we weren't so doomed I'd get every piece of gold I could put my hands on.
    Oh, and food is kinda scarce but who cares about that, right?
    -> You're weird
        Don't forget heartless, my friend.
        And selfish. You really should know me better by now.
